remarks: A section in the category of sets, written out.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
statement:
setcmon.c $e |- C = ( SetCat ` U ) $.
setcmon.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
setcmon.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. U ) $.
setcmon.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. U ) $.
setcsect.n $e |- S = ( Sect ` C ) $.
setcsect $p |- ( ph -> ( F ( X S Y ) G <-> ( F : X --> Y /\ G : Y --> X /\ ( G o. F ) = ( _I |` X ) ) ) ) $.
